duties_responsibilities.duty: Developing the tools by which customers configure and monitor network devices globally
Collaborating with firmware engineers to design, plan, and build new core product features
Constructing intuitive and powerful workflows to solve important problems for IT professionals globally
Crafting and building high-impact technology projects
Ensuring product stability with a high customer focus
Sharing knowledge through tech talks and advocating engineering standard methodologies

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
